segments.text: I see the steady stream of water flowing over the sink, turning the floor into a miniature river.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just keeps drying her dishes, blissfully unaware of the danger lurking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to reaching that jar, and I feel a rush of excitement for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, every time the stool shifts, my stomach drops a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s eager anticipation adds a sweet innocence to the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can’t shake the feeling that this is just the calm before the storm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will happen when the inevitable fall occurs?
segments.speaker: PAR
